DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of intracoronary injection of JRM-001 after reconstructive surgery in pediatric patients with functional single ventricle
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Stem/Progenitor Cell Infusion in Univentricular Physiology (APOLLON Trial)
